      • migrateCertificatesToSqlcipher

        Migrates legacy certificates to sqlcipher
        Parameters:

      • getAdapter

        @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="4.3",
               forRemoval=false)
@ModifierApi(since="4.3",
             target="4.6",
             modifiers="final")
public static AtakCertificateDatabaseAdapter getAdapter()
        Deprecated.
        use the AtakCredentialDatabase directly.
        Gets the adapter which is used to access the underlying database

      • getStore

        public static ICertificateStore getStore()

      • setDeviceId

        public static void setDeviceId​(java.lang.String id)
        Sets the device uid which is used as part of the password generation
        Parameters:
        id - the device identifier to be used

      • getPwd

        public static java.lang.String getPwd​(android.content.Context context,
                                      java.lang.String key,
                                      java.lang.String deviceId)
        Gets the password which is used to initialize the sqlcipher database. The password is derived from the sha256 checksum of 1) a random uuid stored in shared preferences and 2) the device uid
        Parameters:
        context - the context to be used when creating the shared preference
        key - the key to be used
        deviceId - the device identifier

      • initialize

        public static void initialize​(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes the certificate database by opening or creating the underlying sqlcipher database. If the initialization fails, the database will be deleted and recreated
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use when initializing the Certificate database

      • dispose

        public static void dispose()
        Calls dispose on the database adapter, which closes the underlyign sqlcipher database connection

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Deletes the underlying database file from the filesystem

      • getCertificate

        public static byte[] getCertificate​(java.lang.String type)
        Gets the default certificate for the requested type. Default certificates are not associated with any particular server.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate being requested, ATAK core defines a set of TYPE constants in AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace for the certificate types used in core. Plugins may specify any unique type
        Returns:
        p12 file for the requested certificate

      • saveCertificate

        public static void saveCertificate​(java.lang.String type,
                                   byte[] certificate)
        Sets the default certificate for the requested type. Default certificates are not associated with any particular server.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate being requested, ATAK core defines a set of TYPE constants in AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace for the certificate types used in core. Plugins may specify any unique type
        certificate - containing hte p12 file for the requested certificate

      • getCertificateForServer

        public static byte[] getCertificateForServer​(java.lang.String type,
                                             java.lang.String server)
        Gets the certificate for the requested type and server
        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate being requested, ATAK core defines a set of TYPE constants in AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace for the certificate types used in core. Plugins may specify any unique type
        server - host of certificate being requested
        Returns:
        byte[] containing hte p12 file for the requested certificate

      • getCertificateForServerAndPort

        public static byte[] getCertificateForServerAndPort​(java.lang.String type,
                                                    java.lang.String server,
                                                    int port)
        Gets the certificate for the requested type and server and port
        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate being requested, ATAK core defines a set of TYPE constants in AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace for the certificate types used in core. Plugins may specify any unique type
        server - host of certificate being requested
        port - port of certificate being requested
        Returns:
        byte[] containing hte p12 file for the requested certificate

      • getCertificateForIPaddress

        public static android.util.Pair<byte[],​java.lang.String> getCertificateForIPaddress​(java.lang.String type,
                                                                                          java.lang.String IP)
        Gets the certificate based on the given IP Address
        Parameters:
        type - the type
        IP - the IP address
        Returns:
        the Pair of certificate and server name.

                                                                                          java.lang.String IP,
                                                                                          int port)
        Gets the certificate based on the given IP Address
        Parameters:
        type - the type
        IP - the IP address
        port - the port
        Returns:
        the Pair of certificate and server name.

      • saveCertificateForServer

        public static void saveCertificateForServer​(java.lang.String type,
                                            java.lang.String server,
                                            byte[] certificate)
        Sets the certificate for the requested type and server
        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate being requested, ATAK core defines a set of TYPE constants in AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace for the certificate types used in core. Plugins may specify any unique type
        server - host of certificate being saved
        certificate - containing hte p12 file for the requested certificate

      • saveCertificateForServerAndPort

        public static void saveCertificateForServerAndPort​(java.lang.String type,
                                                   java.lang.String server,
                                                   int port,
                                                   byte[] certificate)
        Sets the certificate for the requested type and server and port
        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate being requested, ATAK core defines a set of TYPE constants in AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace for the certificate types used in core. Plugins may specify any unique type
        server - host of certificate being saved
        port - port number that the certificate is associated with
        certificate - containing hte p12 file for the requested certificate

        Parameters:
        type - the type of certificate being requested, ATAK core defines a set of TYPE constants in AtakCertificateDatabaseIFace for the certificate types used in core. Plugins may specify any unique type

      • importCertificate

        public static byte[] importCertificate​(java.lang.String location,
                                       java.lang.String connectString,
                                       java.lang.String type,
                                       boolean delete)
        Imports certificates being imported from mission packages into the certificate database
        Parameters:
        location - location on disk to load certificate from
        connectString - if present, the certificate will associated with the host from the connectString
        type - the type of certificate being import
        delete - boolean indicating if the certificate should be deleted after import

      • saveCertificatePassword

        public static AtakAuthenticationCredentials saveCertificatePassword​(java.lang.String password,
                                                                    java.lang.String type,
                                                                    java.lang.String connectString)
        Saves the certificate password within the AtakAuthenticationDatabase
        Parameters:
        password - password for the certificate
        type - certificate type
        connectString - if present, the password will be associated with the host within the connectString

      • loadCertificate

        public static java.util.List<java.security.cert.X509Certificate> loadCertificate​(byte[] p12,
                                                                                 java.lang.String password)
        Helper method that extracts a list of x509 certificates from the encrypted container
        Parameters:
        p12 - encrypted certificate container
        password - certificate container password

      • checkValidity

        public static com.atakmap.net.AtakCertificateDatabaseBase.CertificateValidity checkValidity​(byte[] keystore,
                                                                                            java.lang.String password)
        Check if certs in store are valid, and will be beyond the specified date
        Parameters:
        keystore - the keystore for the certificate
        password - the password for the keystore
        Returns:
        the state of the certificate as described by the CertificateValidity.

      • convertToPem

        protected static java.lang.String convertToPem​(java.security.cert.X509Certificate cert)
                                        throws java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException
        Helper method that concerts the given x509 certificate to a PEM formatted String
        Parameters:
        cert - X509Certificate
        Returns:
        PEM formatted String
        Throws:
        java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException
